headline: Bernstein’s Chhugani Remains Bullish on Coinbase Global (COIN) with $510 PT
summary: Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the best crypto-related stocks to invest in. On November 17, 2025, Bernstein’s Gautam Chhugani maintained his “Buy” rating on Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) with a $510 price target.
